summary: CONSUMER STARTED VEHICLE WHILE PARKED IN GARAGE.  PLACED GEAR IN REVERSE WITH FOOT APPLIED TO BRAKE AND CAR SUDDENLY ACCELERATED, IN REVERSE, CRASHING INTO CLOSED GARAGE DOOR.  CONSUMER TURNED OFF IGNITION, RESTARTED CAR AND PLACED GEAR IN DRIVE TO MOVE FORWARD.  VEHICLE SUDDENLY ACCELERATED AGAIN CRASHING INTO FORWARD WALL OF GARAGE.  INCIDENT CAUSED OVER $7000 IN DAMAGE TO VEHICLE AND $4000 DAMAGE TO CONSUMER'S HOME.  VEHICLE'S ENGINE HAD PREVIOUSLY SURGED WITHOUT WARNING WHILE DRIVING.  DEALER INSPECTED WAS NOT ABLE TO DETERMINE CAUSE. TS
